name: Station 255
description:
Comrade cosmonaut! Just in time. We've found another derelict in orbit. This one's still mostly in one piece, and it's chock full of 21st century tech. Just what we need.

Your flight leaves in two hours. Subdue whichever constructs are still active, and prepare the station for our civilian scrap crews. Shouldn't be too hard, right?

______

Move with WASD, attack with ARROW KEYS. If you have a gamepad, you can use the D-PAD to move, and attack with the FACE BUTTONS. (abxy) Everything else is explained in the Readme file, where you'll also find some tips on the boss fights.

This game features music by some very talented artists, including Diamond Dissolving, Huskotron, FLiPLUK, A-D-D-F_Toxic, B_Rand0_J, Inkedsplat, Christopher Cornell and Lucas Dicus. You can find more information about the excellent soundtrack in, you guessed it, the Readme file.

______

This game was made for the OST Jam Vol. 2 in slightly less than two weeks, using a provided soundtrack and a theme of Entropy. More information on the jam can be found here: https://itch.io/jam/ost-jam-vol-2
